title: Adobe ExperienceEvent - Message Reply details
description: Details about message replies in a customer journey, tracking email threading and intent

xdm:replySubject.title: Reply Subject
xdm:replySubject.description: Subject line of the reply message.

xdm:replyTimestamp.title: Reply Timestamp
xdm:replyTimestamp.description: Timestamp when the reply was received.

xdm:messageId.title: Message ID
xdm:messageId.description: The Message-ID header value of the reply, uniquely identifying this message in email threading.

xdm:inReplyTo.title: In Reply To
xdm:inReplyTo.description: The In-Reply-To header value, containing the Message-ID of the original message being replied to.

xdm:references.title: References
xdm:references.description: The References header value, containing the chain of Message-IDs in the conversation thread.
